name: 2.0.0-M6
description: JPA/JDO publishing; JDK11+; keycloak; InteractionFactory API

issues.title: Text (multiline?) can be changed on non-editable field, without using edit.
Entering a string such as "10:45" for a joda LocalTime causes stack trace.
Derive ChoicesFacet from ChoicesFromFacet, remove special-case logic.
Not possible to navigate to date/time drop-down using keyboard.
Kroviz - Demo Menu Actions Show No Output
Add metamodel validation:  detect object-type (logical-type) name clashes
Actions with same name but different signature potentially share the same metamodel member id.
SecMan: New User modal dialog ... selected inital role has no label only icon
Regression-Testing: add entity change publishing tests
Duplicated UI notification on DataAccessExceptions.
NPE from ConfigurationViewServiceDefault if there are NO datanucleus.* properties defined.
[WON'T FIX]Navigable parent not updated in breadcrumb panel
Icon size in breadcrumb misaligned with font size
MessageService informUser messages not presented in the UI
source release seems to zip up node_modules & datanucleus.log
Prevent duplicate info messages being rendered
for simpleapp, the Smoke_IntegTests seem to be run twice (by two different surefire executions).
TenantedAuthorizationFacetFactory should not use Mixin Class to filter evaluators
Regression: DomainObject's property setter may never be interpreted as an action
Removing access to a property nevertheless shows as column in table for user.
Wicket BS4 Regression: Property edit button tooltips don't dissapear on inline edit
Regression: SecMan User's Permission Tab is gone
TableColumnOrderForCollectionTypeAbstract should return null for non-recognised collection types
Dependent defaults seems to be broken, eg impersonateWithRoles
SecMan: abstract ApplicationFeatureViewModel.getPermissions() renders with missing columns
Wildcard Generic Type Args are not properly detected, always using Object instead
Dependent default parameters don't refresh
Unreferenced Action not showing up
[DUPLICATE] Support domain events for property and collection mixins
simpleapp's SimpleObject.layout.xml throws metamodel errors unless fieldSetId="..." is defined also.
If action parameter first field is an auto-complete drop-down, then it doesn't get focus.
[Regression] Parented Collections: some associated actions are not showing up
[Regression] Collection Panel: associated actions are not showing up, if the assoc. is specified in the layout.xml only
When both Wicket- and RO-Viewer are provisioned, REST requests fail due to HttpSession creation not allowed
[Regression] SecMan cannot list Roles
[Regression] SecMan cannot open ME menu entry: no such object
Cannot read field "mutatorFacetType" because "mutatorSpec" is null
RO domain-types/<xxx> representation of `members` returns a list instead of a map
cannot 'identify' the value type org.apache.isis.applib.value.LocalResourcePath, as values have no identifier
Impersonation doesn't actually work ... AuthorizorShiro still delegates to ApplicationUser as originally logged in.
[Regression] MM validation fails on abtract mixin member support method
If there is an select2 drop-down param, this takes focus even if not first field
JPA does not persist entities with application-defined primary keys
Add bottom margin spacing after tab groups in Wicket viewer
Fix permission seed data for h2console, make available to secman admin; other minor simplifications
Provide a mechanism so that view models wrapping "just deleted" entity objects don't attempt to reset their state after execution (resulting in runtime error).
TreeNode should be a value in the metamodel
Update helloworld and simpleapp with permissions to allow users to logout (!)
Can't Login to demo wicket nightly 20210602
[Regression] FormExecutorDefault#executeAndProcessResults throws IllegalArgumentException
[Regression] Blob/Clob properties are not rendered with table columns
[Regression] Markup value types are hidden
[Regression] JDO: @Column(allowsNull="true") is not interpreted as Optionality.OPTIONAL
[Regression] Some mixed-in actions don't show up
Fix the order of listeners for metamodel event (security seeding should be early, fixture installation should be late)
To allow beans to be overridden, use `@Priority` instead of `@Order` and remove any `@Primary` annotations.
ModuleFixtureService#modules() needs to be well-defined, to walk the graph correctly ...
Initial fixture scripts can fail to load due to JSF not present exception.
Invoking link for rel object-icon results in HTTP 404
JPA ApplicationUser / ApplicationRole should not use CascadeType.ALL
@Parameter(regex=...) does not allow for parameter to also be optional.
Action returning an unchanged view model does not re-inject domain services into local mixins...
Regression: IllegalArgumentException with Wrapper using Mixin
fix implementation of FixtureScript#wrapMixin
Title tooltip shows the base class, rather than concrete
[NOT A PROBLEM] A tabgroup with tab that contains multiple fieldsets does not surround them correctly (UI cosmetics only)
Names cannot be overridden in menubars.layout.xml
XRay interferes with auditing, as it causes the pending changes to be drained/discarded.
TitleFacetViaMethodsFactory needs to unconditionally remove toString method from action candidates
Impersonation with roles doesn't work with keycloak (next interaction logs out)
JPA Lifecycle events do not fire
Use base64 encoding with o.a.wicket....CookieUtils.save/load.
ObjectBulkLoader should inject dependencies into Pojos
JPA: Framework caches and does not re-read changed state from the database.
reasonVetoed is null, causing NPE
Regression: Fontawesome Icons are not showing up when based on prefix pattern.
Regression: cssClassFa and cssClass not honored with menubars.layout.xml
Tooltip doesn't appear for icons in collections
TableColumnOrderServiceUsingTxtFile: line parsing will eventually fail
Impersonation: eventually throws exception (in the background?)
Ensure ImpersonatedUserHolder can be accessed during initial fixtures
ExecutionParametersDefault: asKeyValueMap(...) assumes newline to be '\n'
Wicket Viewer: ScalarPropertyModel.getManagedProperty() caching is too agressive
@Title throws NPE.
Pending Parameters Model is not capturing values of type LocalDateTime
JpaPropertyPublishingTest succeeds in isolation, fails when run in sequence to other tests
Reinstate automatic injection into entities when resolved.
Secman's UserMementoRefinerForApplicationUser introduces circular dependency
[WON'T FIX] Authentication/Shiro: Add OpenID support
Bring/document in base, docx from incode-platform.
Spring Security Integration
Allow spring security to handle arbitrary authenticated principals (SPI)
Extend UserMemento to include gravatar URL
Decouple SecMan from the authenticator API that is in use.
Extend Wicket viewer to show avatarUrl and realName on header (if available)
Factor out BDD specs as a separate surefire execution so can turn on or off via system properties.
[WON'T FIX] Extend ApplicationRole to show the inferred permissions (similar to ApplicationUser)
Consider promoting the feature dom out of secman and up into core.
Rationalize secman fixture scripts.  In  particular, all regular users of secman should be granted isis.security.LogoutMenu
Collections of Interfaces do not show columns (eg ApplicationUser#getRoles())
[WON'T FIX] Object_ mixins should only be contributed to entities and view models.
Locating the layout.xml should search up the (class) inheritance hierarchy
Allow positioning of Wicket viewer's popups to be configured
Expose minimal InteractionFactory in the applib, to create new InteractionLayers.  Perhaps this is an extension of SudoService ?
Extend UserMemento to contain application tenancy path, and callback to allow secman etc to populate.
Surface UserMemento on the UI
Extend the API of VirtualClock to make it a little easier to work with.
[DUPLICATE] Allow actions to be contributed to domain services also.
Use @AliasFor to declare Spring's @Named from @DomainService(logicalTypeName)
Unit test support fixes (docs and impl)
ServiceRegistry.lookupService should honour @Primary as earlier than any @Priority
Support JVM serialization as a way to mementos of view models that implement java.io.Serializable.
Add library of architecture tests.
Implement EntityChangePublisher for JPA
TableColumnOrderingService using files
Document the logout action.  (Was: Extend the authentication API so that can explicitly logout session.)
Get rid of chatty Shiro messages about no CacheManager being set.
For auditing, Blobs and Clobs should be automatically ignored (also ISIS-1489)
namedXxx() supporting method for dynamic names of actions, properties etc.
Support nested non-static mixins, with domain event class declared within.
Remove support for validate() at Domain Object Level
@Property(entityChangePublishing=DISABLED)
Add JPA support Isis Blob, Clob, AsciiDoc, Markdown, SSE and other value types.
[DUPLICATE] add JPA support command-log extension
Combine @MemberOrder into @PropertyLayout etc.
Replace @MemberOrder#name() with @PropertyLayout#fieldSetId() (and fieldSetName)
Configuration (Menu Action): show additional runtime information
Add support for impersonation (RunAs menu action)
[WON'T FIX] EntityChanges (as consumed by EntityChangesSubscriber) should associate with transaction, not interaction?
Provide a more general purpose Authenticator as an alternative to having to route through Shiro.
Metamodel: Resurrect orphaned supporting method validator
Further rationalize value types representing the metamodel.
[WON'T FIX] Swagger: Harmonize dependencies of metamodel and vaadin viewer
Disable CORS for SimpleApp
Remove usage of deprecated Wicket API ClientProperties.isBrowserInternetExplorer()
Fix schemas for secman (JDO and JPA) to be in line with the owning module.
Recognize eclipselink.* configuration options and pass them over to the EclipseLink integration.
Add EclipseLink configuration property support
Translation context should be provided consistently for collections/properties/services ...
Remove microprofile from incubator
Remove ActionPrompt page from Wicket viewer (unused)
Programming Model: add @ActionLayout/@PropertyLayout(fieldSetId=..., fieldSetName=...)
[WON'T FIX] Simplify layout styles (that are available for download when prototyping)
Metamodel: don't allow annotations to occur more than once for mixins
PrincipalForApplicationUser should use the ApplicationUser username
Add Permission (to role) action in SecMan should use modal dialogue
Promote @Model annotation to Applib (maybe find a better name also)
To reduce CI build time, split out regression tests into multiple modules, so that they can run in parallel
productionise secman a bit more (finish off ImpersonsateUserAdvisor)
Clean up configuration view model a tiny bit
Auto-select fixture script in drop-down if only one
Upgrade Bootstrap 3 to 4 (WicketStuff)
ConcurrentModificationException with MethodFinderUtils.findAnnotatedMethod
Demo: create a JPA stack based variant
Allow for usernames with more than 30 characters in SecMan
CommandLog: split impl into JDO and JPA variants
Do not serve HTTP requests until the Application is fully initialized.
Wicket BS4 Regression: Disabled Action buttons should have mouse cursor disabled style
Make terminology consistent in applib (@DomainObject(objectType=...), TableColumnOrderService, ApplicationFeatureId, BookmarkService)
An error in security seed scripts results in none being installed, but no warning or stacktrace to diagnose from.
Quieten DN warnings if 1:N mismatch in ApplicationTenancy hierarchy
Add TableColumnVisibilityService so that implementations can be used for filtering only.
Spring @Profile support
Remove Persistable_datanucleusIdLong ... duplicated by Object_objectIdentifier
DB connection leak with DataSourceIntrospectionService
Wicket: simplify collection models and member mementos
"You have been redirected" message gets in the way of prototypine menu.
@DomainObject(autoCompleteAction=) should be renamed to autoCompleteMethod
For starter apps, remove persistence.xml (we can get by without it).
Get ready for Maven 3.8.x
@Action(associateWith=) requires separation of layout and behavioral concerns
Defaults callback for dependent vector param is never called when change preceding param arg.
Suppress Object_objectType and Object_objectIdentifier unless for entities.
Allow members of a type hierarchy including interfaces to share the same objectType=...
Bump spring-boot from 2.4.5 to 2.5.0
To reduce learning curve, remove archunit, lockdown and BDD specs from simpleapp.
Allow multiple Authorizors to be registered, with mechanism to decide which to use.
ApplicationUser is unable to modify their own user detais.
Add @MemberSupport for all framework-provided mixins.
Rename ApplicationUserStatus from ENABLED/DISABLED to LOCKED/UNLOCKED
Not sure how filterPermissions is meant to work exactly - slightly confusing output
Can we simplify secman and get rid of SecurityRealm / SecurityRealmCharacteristics ?
Simplify secman's support for user-registration.
Rename secman's 'api' and 'model' submodules to 'applib' and 'integration' respectively
Replace SecmanConfiguration with configuration properties.
If no members visible for type, then veto viewing of _instances_ of that type.
SecMan: rename ApplicationUser_permissions to ApplicationUser_effectiveMemberPermissions
Extend MetaModelServiceMenu downloadMetaModelCsv to include the logicalTypeName as a column.
MetaModelServiceMenu downloadMetamodelXml should filter on logical type namespaces, not on packages
All framework-contributed metamodel features should be in isis.<something> namespace
Shiro permissions should use namespace rather than package; fix
Replace FixtureScriptsSpecificationProvider with configuration properties.
with secman, Impersonation does not correctly figure out permissions of switched user
Support logical type names with value types
Simplify SudoService and others to be based on InteractionService
If home page fails to render (eg due to insufficient permissions), then just suppress.
Rationalize fixture applib's Clock singleton vs VirtualClock (hopefully remove the former)
Metamodel: add (diff friendly) download format ASCII (as a variant to XML)
Metamodel: add diff report (along the various MM downloads)
Download menubars XML is broken, due to @DomainObject annotation on enum
Wicket Viewer:  menu dropdowns should have higher z-index than toast messages
Allow meta-annotations to be declared for entities.
[OBSOLETE] Document the fact that secman requires SudoService to specify a user with appropriate roles
Presence of "mustSatisfy" Specifications causes integ tests to fail .... UNKNOWN bean sort
to avoid explicit casting, make AbstractDomainEvent#getSubject() return <T> T
add @Priority to alll menu @DomainService's
Wicket/BS-Grid: remove css class "col" from container div
Allow HomePageResolverService to be substituted out.
stopImpersonating should always be available (under isis.applib)
Make ObjectIcon(s) available via ManagedObject(s) directly.
secman m:n link table for ApplicationUser/ApplicationRole is in default schema
Remove execPrereq and addPrereq from BuilderScriptAbstract
Remove Object_stopImpersonating mixin
Extend ApplicationFeatureId's API to create from LogicalType
Extend FixtureScript API to allow checking of optional params
Allow mixin actions to be declared on domain services.
Extend AbstractUserAndRoleFixtureScript to allow username and roles to be supplied lazily.
Allow the Wicket viewer's Password reset feature email to support xxx+yyy@  format for emails.
Add JPA support for Blob and Clob (multi-valued)
Change AsciiDoc and MarkDown types to convert on the fly, and rename 'Markup' to 'Html'
Rewrite keycloak integration to use Spring security
Add some overrides for SudoService / InteractionContext to switch the clock.
Improve arch tests for subpackages to work across modules.
HiddenTypeFacetDerivedFromAuthorization should take actions into account
Module 'Apache Isis Core - Schemas' cannot build with JDK-16 (or 17-ea)
Add overrides for XxxDomainEvent for hide/disable/invalidate to evaluate a supplier
Extend base subdomain's convenience annotations, provide JDO applib variants
Additional arch tests for entities etc.
Implement Lightweight Property Change Tracking for JPA
Wicket Blob/Clob: filename is rendered twice in table cells
Cannot run WicketViewer on JVM 17
WicketViewer/ScalarPanelTextField: page scrolls to the top on editing a field
Remove the unnecessary mavendeps, cleanup uses of JDK11+support
Fix module path issues to allow javadoc plugin to be reinstated
Bump Spring Boot from 2.5.3 to 2.5.4
Remove uses of deprectated SecMan config beans
Cover all RO Viewer Endpoints with Debug Logging
Isis 2.0.0-M6 Release activities
Ongoing improvements to the Apache Isis website
Purge Legacy Modules
Bump resteasy-spring-boot-starter from 4.8.0.Final to 4.8.1.Final
Java 11 to replace Java 8 compliance for the entire code base
